storyInfo: The Duke of Gododdin invites Siege and the Exemplars to act on behalf of Parliament, but Siege remains distrustful. Meanwhile, Closure detects a legion of Nachzehrers.

attributes.content: Er, excuse me, who are ye... sir?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Phew... much better.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Once you reach a certain age, you come to prefer bright and warm places.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: And... is that beans I smell?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Er, aye, I was cookin' some canned beans for dinner...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: D'ye want some, sir?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Don't mind if I do.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Would be better if we had some seasoning from home, perhaps some marinated meat.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin
Bagpipe
attributes.content: Aye, I was thinkin' the same! We Gododdins...

attributes.name: Bagpipe
attributes.content: Er...
attributes.joined: Aye, I was thinkin' the same! We Gododdins...Er...

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: I ken who ye are now, and ye’re a wee bit different from whit’s in the news.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ah. Well, you can ask your captain. I held her when she was wee.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Little Rita touched my horn and asked why her dad didn't have one.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: ...I apologize for my insolence at the time, Your Grace.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Not many have the nerve to touch my horns, Lieutenant Skamandros. You showed courage from a very young age.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Or should I say... all of you are brave warriors of Victoria.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Your defense of Chetleigh was outstanding, as was your performance at Brentwood.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: The Exemplars, you call yourselves...
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: I've long wanted to meet you, though it seems your leader does not welcome my presence.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Pardon my frankness, Your Grace, but it is hard to treat your sudden appearance as a pure gesture of good faith.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Of course, Lady Windermere. I understand.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Especially in times like this.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: I sent men to the Irnclad Galavae. They were traveling quickly, but fortunately, I made it in time to present funeral flowers for Amphelise.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: ...I appreciate the gesture.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I assume the duke of Gododdin hasn't come all the way here just to give us a medal?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What if I say I have?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Most of us are neither nobles nor intelligentsia. It would be best if you didn't beat around the bush.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your Royal Highness Alexandrina is as direct as they say.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Or would you prefer that I called you 'Siege', like your friends do?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: I fully understand why the Exemplars avoided the ducal armies along the way.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: You didn't want them to get involved in the machinations of the dukes.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: You want to fight only for Victoria and her people, like the legendary unit that you're named after.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: And so, I'm not here as the Duke of Gododdin.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: I'm here as Sean Gododdin, Member of Parliament, to extend an invitation to the Parliament authorized Tempest Platoon and the rest of the Exemplars.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Leave that outdated identification code behind. I'm asking that you intervene in this war in the name of Parliament.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: The miners' camp has burned to the ground.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: No sign of Sarkaz soldiers.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Misery feels a slight chill. The campsite’s charred debris has cooled.
He moves some collapsed wooden beams aside, and finds a few unrecognizable bodies.
Miners. Remains of the Infected.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: It's all the same, everywhere.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: What's that sound?
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Nice hiding spot, Sudaram.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Nachzehrer spotted to the northwest of Gibsonham—
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Out of comms range already?
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Death has you.
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: Several rune swords pierce out of the ground beneath Misery's feet, but he is no longer there.
Misery rips through the fabric of space with his dagger and retreats out of range. The collapsed ruins turn into a cage, trapping the Nachzehrer's withered bodies.
Shush now...
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: I have you too.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: ...Duke Gododdin.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I understand that the Victorian Parliament has not held a session for a long time.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Everyone who escaped Londinium knows that the Sarkaz have been the ones giving the orders from the Palace of Westhaleg during this time.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Of course. I don't deny the present circumstances.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Why don't we cast our gaze further, though, to the future beyond the war?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: The future? Isn't it a little too early to be bargaining over that — if 'bargaining' and 'coercion' were synonyms?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You misunderstand me. Gododdin is not Caster. I would much prefer to sit by the fireside than gather at the negotiation table. I'm more about drinking and playing cards with friends.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: It gets cold rather quickly once summer is gone. Mind if I have my men add some wood to the fire?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: You might as well have them come in.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: That's much better.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Where were we? Oh yes, the future.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: We know that the war will end, and Victoria will triumph.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: The war will inevitably bring... or should I say has already brought about irreversible changes, ending a twenty-year stalemate.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: If anyone in the room is interested in the empty throne, it certainly isn't me.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Excellent, excellent! See? We already have a consensus.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: As a matter of fact, I held a little meeting not too long ago and saw the Iron Duke in person.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Seeing him always reminds me of when I first saw the Gastrell.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Like so many other children who grew up hearing tales of the Empire's Death Knell, I searched for the shadow of the ruins that belonged to Lingones, only to find not Gaul...
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: But the glory of the strongest nation of our time, so splendid that I could not bear to turn away.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: You want us to believe you care more about Victoria than Gododdin?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Make no mistake, I would never call myself a patriot.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: A duke must always put his dukedom before all else; this is not just a matter of interest, but also a duty, a responsibility.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: But I wonder... what is the difference between Gododdin and Wellington?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Wellington would still be Wellington, with or without Victoria. But what would become of Gododdin, if the light of Victoria went out?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Perhaps it would survive. But things would certainly not get better.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: You don't want the Grand Dukes to really divide Victoria.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm not the only one.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: You know that.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: As strong as Victoria is, she is not without her rivals. Ursus, Leithanien, Columbia, Sargon... all the ambitious nations of Terra have their eyes on us.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: We need a single, unified voice to bring stability.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: This is why Parliament exists. All the ducal realms will select an appropriate representative... including Windermere.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: This is what the Exemplars mean to Victoria. No soldier who fights for the cause of Victoria will need to fear betrayal again.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: The Speaker of Parliament has always been the king, for the entirety of the role's existence. But that does not mean that he — or she — must sit on the throne.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: And this is what you can mean to all of us, Your Royal Highness Alexandrina. If you are willing.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: No one speaks as the duke's words sink in.
Only the crackling of the fire Gododdin lit can be heard.
I have only one question for Your Grace.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If all of this could have waited until after the war—
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Then if I refuse now, can my friends and I leave with the Sighs of Kings?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Siege!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Crossbowmen outside!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: We're surrounded. Maybe we already were the moment he showed up...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Well, well. First we learn what a 'commitment' is to Caster, now we learn what 'friendship' is to Gododdin.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Friends treat each other as equals, do they not?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: My offer remains fair.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: At the minimum... I gave this young friend from Gododdin the opportunity to point her piledriver spear at me.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Lost the signal from Drone 6 again... blasted place!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Alright, Balin, Yvres, Viktor. We have to do this manually.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Status reports, everyone?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: All good here. The beacon's in there and the sensor's running. We're still getting strong interference from the wind and sand. I'm trying to filter out the noise.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: Waiting on you now, Viktor!
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: Five minutes. The ground's softer than expected.
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Careful, quicksand!
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: The soil's very different from the samples we collected. I've sent the data back. You got that, captain?
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: I knew it was a good idea to get you onboard, Yvres. Worth a few days of angry stares from Earthspirit.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I think you can do with a better working environment, Closure. Try not to get too much sand in your mouth...
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Stop talking like Amiya, Balin!
attributes.name: Closure
Closure
attributes.content: My blood is self-cleansing...

attributes.name: Closure
attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...
Haha.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Hey! Don't just laugh at me, keep working! The sooner we get this signal tower set up, the sooner we can broadcast the safe zone locations, and the sooner you can go to town.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm trying! Rhodes Island equipment isn't like anything else I've seen. I'm already doing an 'exemplary' job, get it?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Seriously, though. You and Rockrock shouldn't be here with me in the first place.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You have my drones. Of course I'm staying here with them.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Well, that is a solid reason.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I know you’re concerned about my safety, but I’m actually really strong! What’s that… those Vampire worms would disagree? Well, not all Vampires are built the same, you know?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It's you two I'm worried about. Put your helmets on. Oripathy infection is no joke.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Alright, alright. But you lot are the ones who need to be careful, running around the battlefield like this.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: 'You lot'?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Rhodes Island. You lot are all over the battlefield, not caring for your own safety at all.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Balin is an Infected from Victoria. Yvres is Infected, but not Victorian. Viktor isn't Infected or Victorian. How amazing...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Why? Everyone knows Rhodes Island operators come from everywhere.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I can't help but think of my Granny, Clovisia... plus Tommy and the gang.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I once hoped that the Self-Salvation Corps could be as united as the Rhodes Island operators I'd seen.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Well... people aren't really born good or bad.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: As circumstances change, so do people. Maybe, one day...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: One day, the Self-Salvation Corps will become a tightly knit, united group.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Just like the Exemplars, now all fighting for the same thing. We're ready to brave the worst, ready to deal with defeat, even betrayal.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But it's not necessarily race, upbringing or circumstance that will unite us... just like Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Alright, alright, enough with the compliments, I know you want to keep our equipment. Should I get you a contract now?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm not jealous of Rhodes Island, Miss Closure.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You lot give me the same kind of feeling as this strange communication equipment you're holding.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: A possibility. Something that proves I'm not just a naive dreamer.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Maybe your monologue is starting to bother Closure, Feist...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: What's that sound?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Let me check the feed from Rock-18...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: In the monitor's pixelated image, a sand storm approaches quickly.
Catastrophe? But I don't see the data...
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Beneath the wild sands are tattered banners and the chanting of war.
Nachzehrers... what are they doing here?!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Go.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You two, leave, now. Everyone from the Self-Salvation Corps, head for Gibsonham, now!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What's that sound—
attributes.name: Victorian Sergeant

attributes.content: S-Sarkaz! They're already here!
attributes.name: Victorian Sergeant

attributes.content: Battle stations! Open fire!
attributes.name: Victorian Sergeant

attributes.content: Explosions?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Sir, the Sarkaz are attacking the town! We have to leave, now.
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: They found us quicker than expected.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Looks like the Sarkaz remember the success they had with Amphelise.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: What of the attackers?
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Nachzehrer elites, sir.
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: Your Royal Highness, you and your people must leave with us, now. This town is not worth defending, but you and your friends are of paramount importance to the future of Victoria.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Our battleships can take us back to the Silverrock Bluffs front in three hours. That is where you belong.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Me or the sword?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Sir, we don't have time—
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: You don't have time and you don't plan to fight, even though you know how many civilians there are.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But of course you wouldn't. They're not important to you or the Parliament. These poor families wouldn't produce a single member of Parliament in a hundred years.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: There's no place for them in your game of cards.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I simply have my sights on reality, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Reality? Reality is that the future of Victoria you dream of is to be found in grand halls filled with noble coats of arms.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: My Victoria is here with these people.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Sir—
attributes.name: Flag Officer

attributes.content: Very well, Your Royal Highness.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: You're like your father at times. Naive, reckless...
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Is that so? Not that I care. I don't remember anything about him.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hah. Very well.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Good luck.
attributes.name: Duke of Gododdin

attributes.content: Horn. Order all combat-ready personnel on the plate to their stations, now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: On it.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Delphine. Have Lieutenant Shearer get the logistics and medical staff ready.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Already done.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Follow the plan. Protect the civilians. Prepare for battle!
attributes.name: Siege
